brand.name: eSync Student Management System
brand.tagline: Simple school management for Zambian schools
brand.description: eSync is a mobile-first, cloud-based school management system designed specifically for Zambian schools. It brings academics, finance, communication, and administration into one easy-to-use platform.

hero.headline: Digitise Your School. Simplify Everything.
hero.subheadline: Manage academics, finance, and communication in one powerful platform built for Zambian schools.

features.title: Student & Staff Management
features.description: Manage student records, staff profiles, roles, and access securely from one dashboard.

features.title: Attendance, Exams & Results
features.description: Mark attendance, enter results, and generate academic reports with ease.

features.title: Fees & Payment Tracking
features.description: Track school fees, payments, balances, and arrears accurately.

features.title: Parent–School Communication
features.description: Send announcements and messages to parents in real time.

features.title: Role-Based Access
features.description: Admins, Head Teachers, Teachers, Accounts, Parents, and Students all see only what they need.

features.title: Works Anywhere
features.description: Optimised for phones, tablets, low-end computers, and slow internet connections.

roles.name: Admin
roles.description: Full control of the school system including users, academics, and finances.

roles.name: Head Teacher
roles.description: Academic oversight, staff monitoring, and results approval.

roles.name: Teacher
roles.description: Manage classes, attendance, results, and parent communication.

roles.name: Accounts
roles.description: Manage fees, payments, and financial reporting.

roles.name: Parent
roles.description: View child’s results, attendance, and fee balances.

roles.name: Student
